content-text.text:
Push the Limits!

XumaK offers high-quality training for all levels from authors to architects.  Whether just beginning or at an advanced level, XumaK has the expertise to take you further.

social.links: [{"url":"http://www.twitter.com/TeamXumaK"\,"text":"Follow Us On Twitter"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/twitt.png"},{"url":"http://www.facebook.com/XumaK"\,"text":"Follow Xumak on Facebook"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/face.png"},{"url":"http://www.linkedin.com/company/2036835?trk=pro_other_cmpy"\,"text":"Follow Xumak on LinkedIn"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/linkedin.jpg"}]

textimage.description: This workshop follows the 1 day Adobe® Official Author Class designed by Adobe® and leverages a teaching format designed to impart both the basic knowledge needed by a new business user and exposure to the advanced product capabilities and features presently available in the latest version of CQ5. As part of the learning process, the instructor and students will work collaboratively in and effort to build their own custom training manual using real world examples or based on their company’s implemented CQ5 application. A student attending this workshop should be familiar with web browsers as well as text editors.
textimage.heading: Advanced CQ Author Workshops
